Parameter.name: enable
Parameter.description: Register or unregister for change events.

Command.name: check_account
Command.description: This command returns current user name in its message field if the user is currently singed in.

Parameter.name: un
Parameter.description: HEOS account username

Parameter.name: pw
Parameter.description: HEOS account password

Command.name: reboot
Command.description: Using this command controllers can reboot HEOS device. This command can only be used to reboot the HEOS device to which the controller is connected through CLI port.

Command.name: prettify_json_response
Command.description: Helper command to prettify JSON response when user is running CLI controller through telnet

Parameter.name: enable
Parameter.description: Enable or disable prettification of JSON response.
